entry.title: Bell's Books
entry.summary: I bought three books at Bell's Books, 536 Emerson Street, Palo Alto

a.alt: Three books acquired at Bell's Books, Palo Alto

img.alt: Three books acquired at Bell's Books, Palo Alto

div.p: I bought three books at Bell's Books, 536 Emerson Street, Palo Alto. This is a fairly large, well kept (mostly antiquarian) bookshop.
